hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT Goods.GoodsID AS GoodsId, Goods.GoodsNO AS GoodsNo, Goods.GoodsName AS GoodsName FROM G_Goods_GoodsList Goods LEFT JOIN J_MyGoods MyGoods ON Goods.GoodsID = MyGoods.GoodsId WHERE CheckDate IS NULL OR datediff(hh,MyGoods.CheckDate,GETDATE()) > 24

SELECT G_Goods_GoodsList.GoodsID AS GoodsId,G_Goods_GoodsList.GoodsNO AS GoodsNo,G_Goods_GoodsList.GoodsName AS GoodsName FROM G_Goods_GoodsList LEFT JOIN J_MyGoods ON G_Goods_GoodsList.GoodsID=J_MyGoods.GoodsID WHERE J_MyGoods.PicPath IS NULL OR J_MyGoods.PicPath = ''
